name: SURPRISE PARTY SAVER
description:
##SUBMITTED TO YOGSCAST GAME JAM 2020 ##

##THEME : SURPRISE##

THIS GAME WAS MADE IN 48 HOURS.

IN THIS GAME YOU NEED TOO SAVE THE SURPRISE PARTIES BY DELIVERING THE CAKE ON TIME.

PLEASE GIVE FEEDBACK SO THAT I CAN MAKE BETTER GAMES NEXT TIME.

I RECOMMEND YOU TO DOWNLOAD THE GAME RATHER THAN RUNNING ON YOUR BROWSER.

THIS GAME IS ACTUALLY MY FIRST EVER BIG GAME.

MADE IN CONSTRUCT.

ART AND DEVELOPING - AYAAN

ART - ANUKRITI
